    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                         throws DatabaseException
        Create Java Database connection First tries to load an existing database. If that fails, it checks if the DB was backed up. If there is not backup a fresh DB is created.
        Returns:
        Connection, connection (session) decoworld.server.database.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection(java.lang.String connectionAddress)
                                         throws DatabaseException
        Create Java Database connection
        Parameters:
        connectionAddress - - the address to connect to
        Returns:
        Connection, connection (session) decoworld.server.database.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • backupDatabase

        public static void backupDatabase()
                           throws DatabaseException
        Creates a backup of the database in the backup folder which has the current timestamp in UTC. The backup does not include transactions in progress and the copy is safe for ongoing DB operations.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • restoreDatabase

        public static void restoreDatabase()
